page.title: 15MY FAMILY'S DAY.
page.content: I am Helen,I am 11 years old and I live in{Chippenham.}My family is made up of my two sisters,my one brother,my Mum and Dad and myself.On a typical day in my family Dad gets up first,and goes off to work. He works with computers for a firm in{Devizes,}a town about 16km.from Chippenham. We get up at about 7.30am.and get washed and dressed then have breakfast.Mum takes us to school in the family car because Dad goes to work on his motorbike.Mum stays at home and works as a housewife. When we get home from school we get changed out of our school uniform and go out to play.When Dad comes home at 5.30pm.we have tea together.Sometimes we watch television and our bedtime is between 8.30.and 9.00pm.Mum and Dad go to bed later in the evening.
